content: At the age of six he had learned to use the typewriter and told the teacher that he did not need to learn to write by hand.
translations: ita:A sei anni aveva imparato a usare la macchina da scrivere e disse al maestro che non aveva bisogno di imparare a scriver
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by TRANG (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
